Posts.Content: I agree with the rest, don't freak out! Be sure you can help your mom advocate for what is best for her. Don't let any doctors bully or push her. There are all sorts of support groups both online and in communities, for patients and families. Look for resources for yourself and for her and you will not feel so alone.
Posts.Title: just found out my mom has breast cancer

Posts.Content: I know that when I was on chemo, they told me not to eat grapefruit but I don't know about bananas. I know soy is often used to help with low estrogen.
